name: Twitter full width
description: Adapt the twitter website to a full-width view, with a mobile and tablet adaptive view.
additional_info:
2015-11-16:
* Update due to new Twitter layout
* Only set a fix for large screens
2014-05-14:
* Fixed the tweet box width
* Updated to the new CSS parse validator
2014-05-09:
* Updated container position and margins
* Updated tweet box size
2014-01-16:
* Added a space on the right for the conversation collapse button
* Reduced the width of the cards previews to 510px max
